title: Basic html password input test
description: A basic html password input test.

chrome.output: "enter a fake password, password edit, star, password, star star star, password edit, type in text"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

chrome.output: "Enter a fake password, password edit, star password edit, star star, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password; edit; bullet bullet bullet"

ie.output: "password edit, star star star, enter a fake password, password edit"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

ie.output: "enter a fake password, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, star star star"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password; edit; star star star"

firefox.output: "enter a fake password, password edit, circle bullet, circle bullet, circle bullet, password edit, type in text"

results.notes: announced the name when entering the input and automatically switching to forms mode.

firefox.output: "Enter a fake password, password edit, star password edit, star star, password edit, type in text"
"enter a fake password, password edit, circle bullet circle bullet circle bullet"
in list of form fields as "enter a fake password, edit"

edge.output: "enter a fake password, password, scan off"
"enter a fake password, password, dot dot dot selected, scan off"
"enter a fake password, password. press space to edit."

chrome.output: "enter a fake password, edit protected, bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, selected bullet bullet bullet"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, bullet bullet bullet"
in list of form controls as "enter a fake password; edit; protected; bullet bullet bullet"

firefox.output: "clickable, enter a fake password, edit protected"
"enter a fake password, edit protected, selected"
in list of form controls as "enter a fake password; edit; protected; bullet bullet bullet"
